detectors.description:
AProxy (../../smart-contract-sanctuary/polygon/contracts/mumbai/sorted/0.7.6/1d1cee4d91826b80de83d9d3ba1b46c931a41904_VErc20Proxy.sol/1d1cee4d91826b80de83d9d3ba1b46c931a41904_VErc20Proxy.sol#877-927) may be an upgradeable proxy.
_implementationAddress is declared in the proxy.
AProxy.fallback()._implementationAddress (../../smart-contract-sanctuary/polygon/contracts/mumbai/sorted/0.7.6/1d1cee4d91826b80de83d9d3ba1b46c931a41904_VErc20Proxy.sol/1d1cee4d91826b80de83d9d3ba1b46c931a41904_VErc20Proxy.sol#910) gets value from a cross-contract call: vLighthouse().addressByKey(implementationAddressKey())
IVLighthouse appears to be a Registry contract for the proxy
The address of IVLighthouse comes from the value of ABase.vLighthouse(). (../../smart-contract-sanctuary/polygon/contracts/mumbai/sorted/0.7.6/1d1cee4d91826b80de83d9d3ba1b46c931a41904_VErc20Proxy.sol/1d1cee4d91826b80de83d9d3ba1b46c931a41904_VErc20Proxy.sol#615)
